properties.name: widgetInstanceGlobalAutoRefreshContext
properties.description: Indicates if instance of widget is bound to global auto refresh context. It can be only used with widgets which dynamic component definition contains displaySettings allowing to use it with global auto refresh context.
properties.rawdescription:
Indicates if instance of widget is bound to global auto refresh context. It can be only used with widgets which
dynamic component definition contains displaySettings allowing to use it with global auto refresh context.
